name: wdnpmp-wp_container_template
description: Docker WordPress Nginx Php-FPM mySql phpMyAdmin

scripts._create_folders: start bash -c " cd addon_files ; echo $PWD ; sleep 20 ; mkdir ./certs && mkdir ./certs-data && mkdir ./logs && cd .. && mkdir  ./mysql && mkdir ./PUBLIC && exit 1 "
scripts._build: bash -c " npm run _create_folders && exit 1 " && bash -c "npm run _build_containers && exit 1 "
